entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 27.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 27. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. High minus 21.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon then light snow and local blowing snow. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow and blowing snow. Temperature rising to minus 17 in the evening then falling.
entry.summary: Light snow ending overnight then mainly cloudy. Blowing snow overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming west 50 gusting to 70 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 17 in the evening then falling. Wind chill minus 29 in the evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
